bug.author: SaschaHeyer
bug.description:
Hi Kubeflow Team, the pagination on the experiments page is not working properly. Description
Open the experiments page Switch to next page Error appears
More results existing then just one page. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1991664/59657469-159ec680-91a1-11e9-89e0-de50c9af1299.gif></denchmark-link>
Error message: {"error":"Failed to create list options: Invalid input error: page token does not match the supplied sort by and/or filtering criteria. Either specify the same criteria or leave the latter empty if page token is specified.","message":"Failed to create list options: Invalid input error: page token does not match the supplied sort by and/or filtering criteria. Either specify the same criteria or leave the latter empty if page token is specified.","code":3,"details":[{"@type":"type.googleapis.com/api.Error","error_message":"page token does not match the supplied sort by and/or filtering criteria. Either specify the same criteria or leave the latter empty if page token is specified.","error_details":"Failed to create list options: Invalid input error: page token does not match the supplied sort by and/or filtering criteria. Either specify the same criteria or leave the latter empty if page token is specified."}]} Version: Kubeflow: Build commit: c938247 Kubeflow created with the UI (GCP) Best regards Sascha

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.96. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

/assign <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rileyjbauer>@rileyjbauer</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rileyjbauer>@rileyjbauer</denchmark-link> Can you assign to the right front end person please?

Hello, thank you for filing this report! This was a regression in Kubeflow Pipelines v0.1.16 and was fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/pipelines/issues/1149>kubeflow/pipelines#1149</denchmark-link> as part of the v0.1.17 release, so all subsequent versions of Kubeflow Pipelines should be working as expected.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rileyjbauer>@rileyjbauer</denchmark-link>
great thank you. I deployed Kubeflow to GCP Using the UI <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/gke/deploy/deploy-ui/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/gke/deploy/deploy-ui/</denchmark-link> . So I assume the Kubeflow deployment tool is still using an old version?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rileyjbauer>@rileyjbauer</denchmark-link> Is this still an issue or has it been fixed in the latest release of KF pipelines?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jessiezcc>@jessiezcc</denchmark-link> can you find an owner for this?
This has been fixed since v0.1.17.
Thanks. It looks like we are currently shipping KFP 0.23
